resources.string: Your answers suggest you may not be suffering from depression.
Your answers suggest you may be suffering from mild depression.
Your answers suggest you are suffering from moderate depression.
Your answers suggest you are suffering from moderate to severe depression.
Your answers suggest you are suffering from severe depression.

Still if you feel something isn’t quite right we recommend you schedule an appointment with a doctor. If you need help finding a mental health professional we suggest to reach out in our Psychiatrist section

Consider watchful waiting, and testing again normally within two weeks. We additionally suggest it would be prudent to start a conversation with a doctor. If you need help finding a mental health professional we suggest to reach out in our Psychiatrist section

It doesn’t necessarily mean you have depression but is important that you schedule an appointment with your doctor or a mental health worker. If you need help finding a mental health professional we suggest to reach out in our Psychiatrist section
It is important that you schedule an appointment with your doctor or a mental health worker. If you need help finding a mental health professional we suggest to reach out in our Psychiatrist section
